title: Cost of a liver transplant on the National Health Service in the United Kingdom 2015
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cost in British pounds, and Share of respondents in each Cost in British pounds on the y axis.
Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 has the highest Share of respondents and 2300-5000 has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and minimum Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cost in British pounds in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and lowest at Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cost in British pounds, and Share of respondents in each Cost in British pounds on the y axis.
Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 has the highest Share of respondents and 2300-5000 has the lowest Share of respondents.
There is a difference of 12.0 between the maximum Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and minimum Cost in British pounds 2300-5000.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cost in British pounds in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 21.0 is found at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 and the minimum is found at 2300-5000 where Cost in British pounds is 9.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Cost in British pounds 10000-20000.
Cost in British pounds 2300-5000 has 2.33 times less Share of respondents than Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 which is the highest.
Share of respondents at Cost in British pounds 5000-10000 is 21.0 , second place is 10000-20000 at 19.0, and thirdly is More than 20000 at 18.0.
Similar Share of respondents is found in Cost in British pounds Less than 760, and 760-2300.
The average Share of respondents in all 6 Cost in British poundss is 16.83.
